lt.viko.eif.final_project.dao

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDAOImpl

    public interface CustomerDAO
    The user of this interface has full control of CRUD operations with customer table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a customer to the database.
      boolean deleteCustomer(int id)
      Deletes a specified customer from the database.
      Customer getCustomerById(int id)
      Gets a customer with particular id from the database.
      Customer getCustomerByName(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a customer with particular id from the database.
      boolean updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates a customer with a matching id in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomer

        int addCustomer(Customer customer)
        Adds a customer to the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer object, which will be added
        Returns:
        id of added customer

      • deleteCustomer

        boolean deleteCustomer(int id)
        Deletes a specified customer from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - id of a customer, which will be deleted
        Returns:
        true - if a customer was deleted from the database
        false - if operation failed

      • getCustomerById

        Customer getCustomerById(int id)
        Gets a customer with particular id from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - id of a searchable customer
        Returns:
        launch pad object - if a customer was found
        null - if a customer was not found

      • getCustomerByName

        Customer getCustomerByName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a customer with particular id from the database.
        Parameters:
        name - name of a searchable customer
        Returns:
        launch pad object - if a customer was found
        null - if a customer was not found

      • updateCustomer

        boolean updateCustomer(Customer customer)
        Updates a customer with a matching id in the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer object with updated data, but with the same id
        Returns:
        true - if customer updated in the database
        false - if operation failed
